questionText: What is the fundamental unit of storage on IOTA?
Which of the following is NOT part of the metadata associated with each IOTA object?
How are objects uniquely identified on the IOTA network?

answerOptions.answerText: By a 32-byte globally unique ID derived from the transaction digest and a counter
By a sequential object number assigned at creation
By the hash of their contents

questionText: What does the transaction-object DAG represent in IOTA?

answerOptions.answerText: The relationship between transactions and objects forming a directed acyclic graph
The hierarchy of accounts and their balances
A mapping of all smart contracts deployed on the network
The organizational structure of IOTA nodes
